title: Digimon Adventure Movie (Digimon: The Movie)
synopsis: A brother and sister discover the digital world is more than 1s and 0s when a living creature arrives out of the family computer. The adventures of a group of children start with the appearance of a Digital Monster in the real world.
characters: ['Yagami, Taichi', 'Yagami, Hikari', 'Agumon', 'Ishida, Yamato', 'Takaishi, Takeru', 'Tachikawa, Mimi', 'Izumi, Koushirou', 'Takenouchi, Sora', 'Kido, Jou', 'Yagami, Yuuko']
staff: [['Seki, Hiromi', ['Producer']], ['Hosoda, Mamoru', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Yoshida, Reiko', ['Script']], ['Watanabe, Cheru', ['Theme Song Arrangement']]]
